document_data.caption: A map showing the Giantspine Range on Giantspine.
document_data.name: Giantspine Range
document_data.mainbody: The '''Giantspine Range''' was a mountain range found on the island of [[Giantspine]] in [[Norheim]] in the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: Moonshae Isles|11}}
document_data.Geography: The mountain was a dominant feature of the island, stretching from end to end for over {{SI|40|mi|k|long=yes}}. Aside from the shoreline, and a small forested region in the northwest, the Giantspine Range covered the entire island. The village of [[Seawolf (village)|Seawolf]] was found at the mountain's northern edge, and the capital of [[Hammerstaad]] was found at its southern edge.
